name.ta: FocusTube - YouTubeல் கவனத்தை சிதறடிக்கும் விசயங்களை நீக்குங்கள்

short.ar: قم بإزالة مقاطع فيديو Shorts والتوصيات غير المهمة على YouTube لتجربة مشاهدة خالية من التشتيت.
short.am: Премахнете видеоклиповете Shorts и нерелевантните препоръки в YouTube за фокусирано гледане.
short.bg,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,fi,ja,ml,th,u: Eliminate Shorts videos and irrelevant recommendations on YouTube for a distraction-free viewing experience.
short.ca: Elimina els vídeos Shorts i les recomanacions irrellevants a YouTube per a una experiència de visualització sense distraccions.
short.cs: Odstraňte videa Shorts a nerelevantní doporučení na YouTube pro nerušený zážitek ze sledování.
short.da: Fjern Shorts-videoer og irrelevante anbefalinger på YouTube for en distraktionsfri seeroplevelse.
short.de: Eliminieren Sie Shorts-Videos und irrelevante Empfehlungen auf YouTube für ein ablenkungsfreies Seherlebnis.
short.el: Καταργήστε τα βίντεο Shorts και τις άσχετες προτάσεις στο YouTube για μια εμπειρία παρακολούθησης χωρίς περισπασμούς.
short.es: Elimina los Shorts y videos recomendados irrelevantes en YouTube para una experiencia sin distracciones.
short.es_419: Elimina los videos de Shorts y las recomendaciones irrelevantes en YouTube para una experiencia de visualización sin distracciones.
short.et: Eemaldage YouTube'ist Shorts-videod ja ebaolulised soovitused, et pakkuda segamatut vaatamiskogemust.
short.fa: ویدیوهای Shorts و توصیه‌های نامرتبط را در YouTube حذف کنید تا یک تجربه تماشای بدون حواس پرتی داشته باشید.
short.fil: Alisin ang Shorts na mga video at mga rekomendasyong hindi mahalaga sa YouTube para sa isang distraction-free na karanasan sa…
short.fr: Éliminez les vidéos Shorts et les recommandations non pertinentes sur YouTube pour une expérience sans distraction.
short.gu: YouTube પર Shorts વિડિઓઝ અને અપ્રસ્તુત ભલામણોને દૂર કરો અને નિરાધાર જુઓ અનુભવ મેળવો.
short.he: הסרו סרטוני Shorts והמלצות לא רלוונטיות מ-YouTube לצפייה ללא הסחות דעת.
short.hi: YouTube पर Shorts वीडियो और अप्रासंगिक सिफारिशों को समाप्त करें, एक विचलन-मुक्त देखने का अनुभव प्राप्त करें।
short.hr: Uklonite Shorts videozapise i nevažne preporuke na YouTubeu za iskustvo gledanja bez ometanja.
short.hu: Távolítsa el a Shorts videókat és a nem releváns ajánlásokat a YouTube-ról a zavartalan nézési élmény érdekében.
short.id: Hilangkan video Shorts dan rekomendasi yang tidak relevan di YouTube untuk pengalaman menonton yang bebas gangguan.
short.it: Elimina i video Shorts e le raccomandazioni irrilevanti su YouTube per un'esperienza di visione senza distrazioni.
short.kn: YouTubeನಲ್ಲಿ Shorts ವೀಡಿಯೋಗಳು ಮತ್ತು ಅಸಂಬದ್ಧ ಶಿಫಾರಸುಗಳನ್ನು ತೆಗೆದುಹಾಕಿ, ನಿರ್ಬಂಧವಿಲ್ಲದ ವೀಕ್ಷಣಾ ಅನುಭವವನ್ನು ಪಡೆಯಿರಿ.
short.ko: YouTube에서 Shorts 동영상과 관련 없는 추천을 제거하여 산만함이 없는 시청 경험을 제공하세요.
short.lt: Pašalinkite „YouTube“ Shorts vaizdo įrašus ir nereikšmingas rekomendacijas, kad galėtumėte žiūrėti be trukdžių.
short.lv: Noņemiet Shorts videoklipus un nevajadzīgus ieteikumus pakalpojumā YouTube, lai skatītos bez traucējumiem.
short.mr: YouTube वर Shorts व्हिडिओ आणि अनावश्यक शिफारसी काढून टाका आणि एक व्यत्ययमुक्त पाहण्याचा अनुभव मिळवा.
short.ms: Singkirkan video Shorts dan cadangan tidak relevan di YouTube untuk pengalaman menonton yang bebas gangguan.
short.nl: Verwijder Shorts-video's en irrelevante aanbevelingen op YouTube voor een ongestoorde kijkervaring.
short.no: Fjern Shorts-videoer og irrelevante anbefalinger på YouTube for en distraksjonsfri seeropplevelse.
short.pl: Usuń filmy Shorts i nieistotne rekomendacje na YouTube, aby uzyskać nieskazitelne wrażenia z oglądania.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT,tr: Elimine vídeos Shorts e recomendações irrelevantes no YouTube para uma experiência de visualização sem distrações.
short.ro: Eliminați videoclipurile Shorts și recomandările nerelevante pe YouTube pentru o experiență de vizionare fără distrageri.
short.ru: Устраняйте видео Shorts и нерелевантные рекомендации на YouTube для просмотра без отвлечений.
short.sk: Odstráňte videá Shorts a nerelevantné odporúčania na YouTube pre nerušený zážitok zo sledovania.
short.sl: Odstranite videoposnetke Shorts in nepomembna priporočila na YouTubu za nemoteno gledanje.
short.sr: Uklonite Shorts video zapise i nebitne preporuke na YouTube-u za neometano iskustvo gledanja.
short.sv: Ta bort Shorts-videor och irrelevanta rekommendationer på YouTube för en distraktionsfri tittarupplevelse.
short.sw: Ondoa video za Shorts na mapendekezo yasiyo ya muhimu kwenye YouTube kwa ajili ya uzoefu wa kutazama bila mvuto usiofaa.
short.ta: YouTubeல் Shorts வீடியோக்களையும் தொடர்பற்ற பரிந்துரைகளையும் நீக்கி, ஒரு கவனச்சிதறாத பார்வையாளர் அனுபவத்தைப் பெறுங்கள்.
short.te: YouTube లో Shorts వీడియోలు మరియు అప్రాధాన్యతగల సిఫారసులు తొలగించి శ్రద్ధ చెరగని వీక్షణ అనుభూతిని పొందండి.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate Your YouTube Experience with FocusTube!
Streamline your YouTube browsing and enjoy a distraction-free, personalized video journey with FocusTube, the ultimate tool to customize your content feed.

🌟 What's New?

🎥 Hide YouTube Shorts
Say goodbye to the endless loop of YouTube Shorts. Easily toggle to hide them from your feed, ensuring you stay focused and in control of your viewing experience.

🔍 Hide YouTube Suggestions
Tired of getting distracted by irrelevant recommendations? Remove suggestions with one click, allowing you to immerse yourself in content that truly matters to you.

🙈 Hide Blacklisted YouTube Channels
Curate your YouTube recommendations by blocking unwanted channels. Create a personalized blacklist, ensuring your feed is filled with content that aligns with your interests.

⛔ Hide Blacklisted Words in Titles
FocusTube lets you block specific words in video titles. Use the customizable word blacklist to filter out videos that don’t match your preferences and optimize your browsing.

🚀 NEW FEATURE: Hide Home Page Content
Take your focus to the next level! Block the entire YouTube homepage content to create a clean, distraction-free space. Just use the toggle, and your home feed will be cleared, leaving only the search bar visible.

🚀NEW FEATURE: 🚫 Stop Autoplay After Videos End
With FocusTube, you have full control over your viewing experience by easily enabling or disabling YouTube's autoplay feature. Prevent the platform from automatically playing the next video, giving you the freedom to choose what to watch next and when. Enjoy a focused and personalized YouTube journey, free from unwanted distractions.

Why FocusTube?
🎉 Easy to Use
FocusTube seamlessly integrates into YouTube’s interface. Simple toggles allow you to customize your feed in seconds. Tailor your viewing journey without ever leaving YouTube.

🔧 Customizable and Flexible
With multiple filtering options and blacklist features, FocusTube gives you complete control over what you want to see (and what you don't).

🧘 Distraction-Free Experience
Stay focused, cut out the noise, and get the most out of your YouTube browsing with minimal distractions.

How to Use FocusTube
Install FocusTube from the Chrome Web Store.
Activate the Features you prefer using the simple toggle switches in the settings.
Blacklist Channels or Words to block specific content from appearing in your feed.
Revitalize your YouTube Experience—embrace a distraction-free, personalized content journey.
Install FocusTube now and enjoy a bespoke, distraction-free YouTube experience today!
